chunk:
Blue Lagoon Skincare BL+ The Serum

Brand: Blue Lagoon

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: SEA WATER (MARIS AQUA), WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM LEVULINATE, SODIUM ANISATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, LECITHIN, BIOSACCHARIDE GUM-1, ALGAE EXTRACT, SILICA, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, CITRIC

YL CAPRYLATE, CITRIC ACID, TOCOPHEROL.

Directions: Use morning and evening, after cleansing, on the face and neck. Apply 4-6 drops of the serum on the palm of your hand and fingertips and gently pat and press onto the face. With any remaining serum, gently press onto the neck and décolleté with a light massage upward.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: U
nt concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
